metadata.name: PowerShell Scripts Installed as Services
metadata.comment: Detects powershell script installed as a Service

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('service control manager') AND metadata.event_code = 7045 AND (contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('pwsh'))))

output.summary: Detects powershell script installed as a Service
